Details.Textbox24: The mission of the Agency is to supply imported and recycled water; collect, treat, and dispose of wastewater; and provide other utility-related (renewable electrical energy, compost) services to the communities it serves. The Agency strives to provide these services in a regionally planned, managed, and cost-effective manner.
Details.Textbox41: P.O. Box 9020 Chino Hills, California US
Details.Textbox73: Reporting Protocol: General Reporting Protocol 2.1 and associated updates and clarifications
Details.Textbox108: Verification Body: Ruby Canyon Engineering Inc.
